Description:
Knowledge of healthcare regulations, standards, and compliance requirements.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to assess complex situations and identify potential risks.
Excellent communication skills to convey risk-related information clearly and effectively.
Proficiency in using risk management software tools and Microsoft Office Suite.
Attention to detail and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
Any relevant certifications in risk management or healthcare compliance would be a plus.Job Details
